pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data employed in the vignette of the GSVA package // This package stores the data employed in the vignette of the GSVA package. These data belong to the following publications: Armstrong et al. Nat Genet 30:41-47, 2002; Cahoy et al. J Neurosci 28:264-278, 2008; Carrel and Willard, Nature, 434:400-404, 2005; Huang et al. PNAS, 104:9758-9763, 2007; Pickrell et al. Nature, 464:768-722, 2010; Skaletsky et al. Nature, 423:825-837; Verhaak et al. Cancer Cell 17:98-110, 2010
